title: Kind of Display Sans serif
content:
Hi, would anyone know what font is this? Its probably a free font  
thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822143449im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_4389.jpg)
author: mariano

comments.content: The closer I can find is **[Detonate BRK](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822143449/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Detonate%20BRK%20-%20Regular&fid=34c82fec682e39f5fd2c1b1576e12bb3&fsize=60&text=sinergia%20SINERGIA&wrap=2)** free font by Ænigma [1999] but it requires a lot of modifications to match your sample
